CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
M and C talk in very low voices

u.a: C seems to gesture toward what he's talking about
C doesn't answer but takes plate from her hand
M picks up bed and sets it down again
M starts with one thing; changes mind and holds cup
C pretends to drink from cup
M turns her attention to play+house
M and C are reaching in play+house
M pours from pitcher near C; C drinks from cup

g.ga: shrugs shoulders and puts empty palms up

u.a: <bef> C indicates he wants more by gesturing with cup
C puts toy where M indicated
M points at picture as she names it
C turns pages before she points out things
M points firmly when C doesn't respond immediately
C looks at page; starts to close book
M blocks C from closing book
